title: Ivartheragnarson
author: Ivartheragnarson
content: just think when we Reach the limit of Telegram channels And groups or discord servers we cannot join channels, groups or servers on discord or Telegram . So when we participating for Airdrops campaigns we've to add another Telegram or discord account to  Gleam and other platforms usually .So adding another account  and disconnecting current discord or telegram account is a reason to be disqualified for ongoing Airdrops? ( Which we participated with current discord or telegram account ) I mean is that a trouble making option to previous Airdrops we have participate before linking new discord and Telegram account?could anyone give me a better answer please. thank you all.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Just read the rules that has been set for the airdrop campaigns that you're joining. AFAIK, if you've joined one then you can't join with other account you also own because that's an abuse. That's why it is important for you to read the instructions and rules so that you won't violate the rules that has been set to participants like you.

Or the value is not worth anymore as compare to like 2017 or early 2018.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: I guess that could be considered cheating. A participant can only join 1 account. If you have previously participated in other airdrops/giveaways, I think it's safe to say that you understand the rules of those airdrops. This means you can take part in the airdrop.Of course, every airdrop campaign must add a Telegram account username. Well, if you have another Telegram account in the same airdrop you may not join that airdrop. That means if you abuse the campaign.If they disallow linking accounts with the same person, you should respect that and open a new account. I guess you broke the airdrop rules too.

And good luck to you

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: This problem is solved by clearing your social networks of unnecessary subscriptions. It's very simple. I always do this when some airdrop or giveaway ends. What's the point of cluttering up your social networks with all those subscriptions you made just to participate in the next giveaway. Over the years of participating in various giveaways, my social networks could have been cluttered many times over if I hadn't taken care of constantly cleaning out unnecessary subscriptions, channels, etc.
